nodes.text: Mazie was a female Twi'lek from Ryloth living in the final years of the Galactic Republic.

Mazie and her daughter, Berri, were slaves under the crime-lord Krayn laboring in the spice-processing facilities on Nar Shaddaa. She befriended Anakin Skywalker and made it her business to relieve the discomforts of (and dangers to) her fellow slaves. Mazie helped Skywalker to persuade the slaves to revolt against Krayn, resulting ultimately in their freedom.

Ironically, Mazie and her family had moved to Tatooine from Ryloth in 39 BBY, in order to avoid slavery, only to be seized and cast into slavery later by Krayn. Mazie's destiny was a sad one, however, as she later died in a tragic shootout.
